page.title: 04 Shopping in Torpoint cont.2
page.content:
RESULTS cont. 4. 1 person the Clothes Shop,2 the News agents,3 the Greengrocer and 3 the D.I.Y Store. 5. 18 people said Yes 23 said No and 1 said average to whether Torpoint shops had enough choice. 6. 30 people would like shops on the housing estate 8 would not and 4 were not sure. 7. 6 people shopped once a week in Torpoint ,6 twice a week ,7 three times a week ,3 four times a week ,2 five times a week ,3 never and 15 everyday. 8. 40 people said no, 1 person said yes and 1 was not sure about the amount of parking in Torpoint.
A group of children went round the whole of Torpoint and counted all the shops ,offices and banks in Torpoint _
